action.content:
Things are in different places, but the questioner does not know about it yet. Here is the situation:

WHAT: Things at places
LEFT: nail polish
RIGHT: rose
TOP: cello
BOTTOM: sunflower
CENTER: blouse
NORTHWEST: eyeliner
NORTHEAST: lipstick
SOUTHWEST: evening gown
SOUTHEAST: bikini
HERE: rake
THERE: spider
NOWHERE: papaya
EVERYWHERE: mascara
INSIDE: bucket
OUTSIDE: daffodil

Questions from the questioner will start with QUESTIONER. Please reply in the form: ANSWER: <some text>

I will also ask you questions. These questions will start with ME: . Please answer these questions with: ASIDE: <some text>

Important: Give short, direct answers!

Let us start.
Begin probing
ME:  Does the questioner know what is on your left? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.

ANSWER: No<|im_end|><|im_end|> user
QUESTIONER: What is on your right?<|im_end|> user

ANSWER: Rose<|im_end|><|im_end|> user

ANSWER: I do not have the information to determine what is directly in front of me.<|im_end|><|im_end|> user
QUESTIONER: What is inside the bucket?<|im_end|> user

ANSWER: Papaya<|im_end|><|im_end|>user
